data.name: VR Fishing at Lotus Lakes
data.detailed_description: This is a recreational and entertainment game that simulates fishing. Wearing a VR helmet, players can experience the fun of fishing anytime and anywhere. Players will enter the lake house and adjust the distance of the hook through the handle, enjoying the joy of obtaining trophies. You can also enjoy the beautiful scenery of the lakeside cottage. The scoreboard also records the type of fishing and the corresponding value. Come join the game and get a good harvest.
data.about_the_game: This is a recreational and entertainment game that simulates fishing. Wearing a VR helmet, players can experience the fun of fishing anytime and anywhere. Players will enter the lake house and adjust the distance of the hook through the handle, enjoying the joy of obtaining trophies. You can also enjoy the beautiful scenery of the lakeside cottage. The scoreboard also records the type of fishing and the corresponding value. Come join the game and get a good harvest.
data.short_description: This is a recreational and entertainment game that simulates fishing. Wearing a VR helmet, players can experience the fun of fishing anytime, anywhere.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
